import React, { Component } from 'react' // 引入样式文件 import styles from '../../style/Weather.module.less' // 引入请求接口文件 import { getWeatherDate } from '../../api/weather' // 引入 localStorage 方法 import storage from '../../utils/storage' class Weather extends Component{ constructor () { super() this.state = { weatherData : {}, fiveDayList : [] } } // 已挂载生命周期 componentDidMount () { getWeatherDate() .then((data) => { storage.setItem('weatherList', data.data) }) .catch((err) => { console.log('调用接口错误', err) }) } // 是否应该执行组件更新(生命周期) shouldComponentUpdate (nextProps, nextState, nextContext) { console.log('📇📜: Weather -> shouldComponentUpdate -> nextState', nextState) if (nextState.weatherData === data && nextState.fiveDayList === data.forecastDayList) { return false } else { this.setState({ weatherData : data, fiveDayList : data.forecastDayList }) } } // 组件挂载前 componentWillMount () { let data = storage.getItem('weatherList') console.log('📇📜: Weather -> componentWillMount -> data', data, this) } render(){ let { weatherList, fiveDayList } = this.state console.log(this) return(
2
